dct_title_s: The Gulf war zone : a series of Hammond pull-out maps / Hammond Incorporated.
dct_description_sm: "Middle East" map shows oil fields, major pipelines, and principal tanker routes in western Middle East. Dates of pipelines also shown. From February 4, 1991 issue of Newsweek. Issued as a "Pull-out map of the war zone." Panel title. Includes textual information on military forces in the area entitled "Under the gun" and a note on the military history of the area.
